name: Sebastian Rehm
what_is_my_connection_to_javascript: I've been fascinated with the web for a long time. Because of the ease-of-use and the access to many different platforms I've been using JS for a lot of project during my studies. Nowadays I'm mostly working on a webapplication with a sizable JavaScript frontend.
what_can_i_contribute: Knowledge about integrating Gulp and Rails. Running Gulp on a VM.
